item.title: Configuring Hotspot 2.0 / Passpoint 2.0 on OpenWRT

item.description: Explore the step-by-step guide to create Hotspot 2.0 on OpenWRT, ensuring seamless connections and enhanced security. Dive into the future of Wi-Fi effortlessly.

item.title: Secure Data: Robocopy Backup and Restore Guide

item.title: Mastering Windows Registry: Command Line Tips for Efficient Configuration

item.title: Automate Windows 11 Installation: Bypass TPM, Secure Boot, and RAM Checks
item.description: Streamline Windows 11 installation in virtualized environments by bypassing TPM, Secure Boot, and RAM checks using autounattend.xml and vTPM.
